name: Go Eskimo (Jam Game)
description:
Tutorial:

 Press "Space" to change the gravity, use "A" and "D" for control the character in the air.

Alternative commands:

 Change gravity - "Space" or "Z";

 Movement - "A" and "D" or "Right Arrow" and "Left Arrow".

* The game has partial joystick support.

Description:

 This game is a runner, but... without run ! 

 This game was made in 2 days for the GMTK game jam.

Credits:

 All the art is created by Eduardo Silva and the programming by Wigner Matos.
